qas.question: What is an example of a memorable name for a pub chain?
What sort of theme is thought memorable for modern pub names?
What is the purpose of a pub name?

answers.text: to identify and differentiate each pub

context: Pub names are used <a2_0>to identify and differentiate each pub<a2_0/>. Modern names are sometimes a marketing ploy or attempt to create "brand awareness", frequently using a <a1_0>comic<a1_0/> theme thought to be memorable, <a0_0>Slug and Lettuce<a0_0/> for a pub chain being an example. Interesting origins are not confined to old or traditional names, however. Names and their origins can be broken up into a relatively small number of categories.
